Turns until seat can be usurped

conclave_influence_change_holder.componentleveltooltip: [[col:yellow]]You gain 1 Conclave Influence per turn per region you own.You can gain up to 5 additional Conclave Influence per turn from your Towers[[/col]]

help_text_block.component_level_text:
[[b]]Seats[[/b]]

[[img:icon_conclave_influence]][[/img]] Claim Seats by spending Conclave Influence. Seat rewards apply only to your faction.

[[img:icon_turns]][[/img]] After five turns, Seats which are claimed can be usurped by another faction for an increased cost.

[[img:bullet_point_white]][[/img]] Seats in The Conclave cannot be usurped.


[[b]]Districts[[/b]]

[[img:bullet_tower_of_zharr]][[/img]] Seats are grouped into Districts. When all Seats in a District are claimed a District reward is unlocked.

[[img:chd_astragoth]][[/img]][[img:chd_drazhoath]][[/img]][[img:chd_zhatan]][[/img]] District rewards apply to all Chaos Dwarfs.

[[img:bullet_point_white]][[/img]] When two or more Districts in a tier are completed, the next tier of Seats is unlocked.

component_text.text: Unlock this tier by completing one or more districts in 'dy_tier_name'
Unlock this tier by completing one or more districts in 'dy_tier_name'
